title: Proposal: Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline

reasoning.problem: Establish a formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline. This pipeline should include automated summarization, categorization, and assignment of documents to relevant departments for analysis and action. This is necessary to efficiently process the influx of information and ensure timely responses to critical inputs, particularly those related to AI safety and governance. The Department of Education will handle the 'Constitutional AI' PDF, the Department of Consciousness will handle 'Descartes' Error' and 'Cicero's De Officiis', and the Department of Strategy & Research should examine 'Aristotle's Politics'. The pipeline must also handle PDF parsing errors robustly. The initial focus is to prioritize documents based on assessed importance and potential impact on the Republic's core objectives.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
